name: Top Down Golf
description:
In Top Down Golf you can go more strategic in the relaxed CLASSIC mode, getting to the hole in the fewest shots possible
or
just show your best skills by being the first to reach the hole in the fast paced RUSH mode.

Explore all the worlds and discover tons of different maps.

KEY FEATURES
• Play together in real-time with real players across all over the world.
• Challenge your friends to epic 1 vs 1 matches where bragging rights are at stake.
• Either relax and take aim in Classic mode or feel the pressure to be the first to score on Rush mode.
• Explore four beautiful worlds with different obstacles that will challenge your skills.
• Win matches and get rewarded with victory chests full of awesome prizes!
• Unlock & upgrade your clubs, get special balls and combine your gear according to your game style!
• Level up and progress through 4 different worlds, 8 tours with different difficulty levels and +200 different maps!


Join the ultimate mini golf mobile adventure! Get Top Down Golf NOW!
